title: Coast to Coast AM - Aug 12 2013 - Fracking - Solar Outbursts &am
description:
Date:	08-12-13
Host:	George Noory
Guests:	Richard Heinberg, Robert M. Schoch
News segment guests: Douglas Hagmann , Steve Kates "Dr. Sky"

Hours 1 & 2: Peak Oil educator and fossil fuel critic, Richard Heinberg, discussed the problematic aspects of fracking as an energy resource.

Hours 3 & 4: Robert M. Schoch, Ph.D discussed how coronal mass ejections (CMEs) from the Sun unleashed discharges upon Earth which triggered massive earth and climate changes, and decimated civilizations which predated Egypt.

Websites:
richardheinberg.com
postcarbon.org
robertschoch.com

Books:
Snake Oil: How Fracking's False Promise of Plenty Imperils Our Future
Energy: Overdevelopment and the Delusion of Endless Growth
The End of Growth: Adapting to Our New Economic Reality
Forgotten Civilization
Voyages of the Pyramid Builders
Voices of the Rocks
